searchResultsTool.doSearch: Enter a text in the searchbar
searchResultsTool.examples:
You can search for adresses, locations, businesses or coordinates.

Address searches can be done combining :

  • civic number
  • street name
  • city
  • postal code

Coordinates search example :

  • Decimal degree:
    -68.165547, 48.644546
  • Degrees, Minutes, Seconds:
    -68 9 56, 48 38 40
